title: Drawing, "Design for Cyprus Scene, for Othello", 1932
signed: Signed in white chalk, upper right: E. Mck. K.
inscribed: Inscribed in white chalk, upper right: This for the general / effect for the Cyprus / scene.; lower right: scene I. Part 2.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Exterior night scene with brick wall with arched doorway at right, crenellation details and stairs. Two hole punches on left edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Cyprus Scene, for Othello", 1932.
1932. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-185.
